LightningComponentBundle.description: Configurable list view component with dynamic object selection, custom filters, and 6-position card layout. Combines features from mobileListView and pillSearch.

property.name: sObjectType
property.label: Object API Name
property.description: Salesforce object API name (e.g., 'Account', 'Contact')

property.name: fields
property.label: Fields to Retrieve
property.description: Comma-separated field names (e.g., 'Name,Type,Industry,Owner.Name'). Supports relationship fields.

property.name: filterClause
property.label: Filter Clause
property.description: Optional WHERE clause (e.g., 'Type = \'Customer\' AND Industry != null')

property.name: orderBy
property.label: Order By Field
property.description: Field name to sort by (e.g., 'Name', 'CreatedDate'). Defaults to 'Name' if available.

property.name: limitRecords
property.label: Limit Records
property.description: Maximum number of records to display (default: 50, max: 200)

property.name: sectionName
property.label: Section Name
property.description: Accordion section title

property.name: iconName
property.label: Icon Name
property.description: SLDS icon name (e.g., 'standard:account')

property.name: flowUrl
property.label: Flow URL
property.description: URL for redirection on card click (e.g., '/flow/My_Flow'). Adds ?recordId={id} automatically.

property.name: techMode
property.label: Tech Mode
property.description: If checked, adds &TechMode=true to the URL

property.name: topLeftField
property.label: Top Left Field
property.description: Field name for top left position (e.g., 'Name')

property.name: topRightField
property.label: Top Right Field
property.description: Field name for top right position (e.g., 'Type')

property.name: middleLeftField
property.label: Middle Left Field
property.description: Field name for middle left position

property.name: middleRightField
property.label: Middle Right Field
property.description: Field name for middle right position

property.name: bottomLeftField
property.label: Bottom Left Field
property.description: Field name for bottom left position

property.name: bottomRightField
property.label: Bottom Right Field
property.description: Field name for bottom right position

property.name: topLeftFormat
property.label: Top Left Format
property.description: Template for top left (e.g., '{Name} - {Type}'). Use field names in braces. Overrides Top Left Field if set.

property.name: topRightFormat
property.label: Top Right Format
property.description: Template for top right position

property.name: middleLeftFormat
property.label: Middle Left Format
property.description: Template for middle left position

property.name: middleRightFormat
property.label: Middle Right Format
property.description: Template for middle right position

property.name: bottomLeftFormat
property.label: Bottom Left Format
property.description: Template for bottom left position

property.name: bottomRightFormat
property.label: Bottom Right Format
property.description: Template for bottom right position
